Post-Match Reflections: Manager Bruce Bochy claimed his fourth World Series crown.

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Texas Rangers won their first World Series title after a 62-year wait.
Victory for manager Bruce Bochy saw the 68-year-old claim his fourth World Series crown.
